segments.text: What do you plan to do on Sunday morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about going to English corner with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , I am poor at English , especially spoken English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's why you should go there , If you don't dare to speak English owing to the fact that you are afraid of making mistakes , you simply will never learn English .
segments.speaker: S1
